title: logon
description: A function from an imported library.

success.description: Set to false to indicate an unsuccessful logon attempt.

logoff:time.description: The time the logon session ended.

host.description: The host that the account logged in to.

creds.description: The credentials that were used for the logon.

duration.description: The duration of the logon session.

client:host.description: The host where the logon originated.

client:ipv4.description: The IPv4 where the logon originated.

client:ipv6.description: The IPv6 where the logon originated.
